games.title: Pokken Tournament DX

games.title: Splatoon 3

games.description: A 3D Mario platformer with vast open worlds, new power-ups, and Cappy, Mario's new hat companion.

games.title: Luigi's Mansion 3
games.description: Luigi explores a haunted hotel, using his trusty Poltergust to solve puzzles and catch ghosts.

games.description: A retro-inspired platformer with pixel art, treasure hunting, and epic boss battles.

games.description: A direct sequel to Breath of the Wild, with new powers, locations, and epic battles.

games.description: A remastered version of the classic first-person Metroid adventure with updated visuals.

games.description: An open-world Zelda game with a huge world to explore, filled with puzzles and epic battles.

games.description: A hack-and-slash game set 100 years before the events of Breath of the Wild, featuring epic battles.

games.description: A colorful team-based shooter where players use ink to claim territory and defeat opponents.
